local_intent: Maintain stable grasp and move to a safe hover pose above the plate, then pause.
assumptions: Grapes are already grasped and stable
Plate pose is known and reachable; no scan required
coherence_with_global: Implements the transfer phase by verifying stable grasp, executing MoveAbove(plate, 0.05, 1200), confirming arrival with IsAt(plate), and pausing for 400 ms, matching the GLOBAL_BT sequence after pick.
